brandAnalysis.name: Balmain Body
brandAnalysis.originStory: Founded by Gavin in Sydney, Balmain Body was born from frustration with overpriced men's fragrances. Starting in a small lab, Gavin began hand-mixing colognes with premium ingredients, cutting out middlemen to deliver quality scents at honest prices.
brandAnalysis.missionStatement: To democratize luxury fragrances for Australian men by crafting premium scents locally at prices that make sense.
brandAnalysis.uniqueValueProposition: Premium Eau de Parfum fragrances inspired by luxury brands, crafted in Australia with high-quality ingredients, at just $30-35 per bottle when bundled.
brandAnalysis.brandJourney: From a small Sydney lab to selling out fast, Balmain Body has disrupted the men's fragrance market by proving that quality doesn't require luxury pricing.
brandAnalysis.customerPromise: Smell expensive without the expensive price tag - backed by our 30-day no-questions-asked return policy.
brandAnalysis.uniqueSellingPoints: Australian-made premium fragrances at 70% less than luxury brands, with 30-day free returns and personalized scent matching quiz
brandAnalysis.seasonalFocus: Year-round essentials with seasonal limited editions
brandAnalysis.loyaltyProgramDetails: Bundle rewards - save more when buying 3 or 5 fragrances
brandAnalysis.emailSignature:
Cheers,
Gavin & The Balmain Body Team

trustBadges.description: Free shipping on all orders over $70
No questions asked returns within 30 days
Locally crafted in Sydney with premium ingredients

competitors.name: Chemist Warehouse Fragrances
differentiators: Balmain Body offers premium quality at similar prices

competitors.name: Luxury Department Stores
differentiators: Balmain Body offers similar quality at 70% less

testimonials: Perfect for work and play - Dermot C.
I'm actually surprised they smell so good. Took the chance and it paid off - Andrew K.
Very happy with them all... the wife has commented on all 3 - Scott L.
It gets noticed. As a teacher of nurses 90% of my classes are women - Rob T.
Smells premium and lasts long. Will buy again - Sanju
Actually getting compliments with this one - Ethan S.

customerPersonas.name: The Professional Millennial
customerPersonas.description: Young professional who wants to smell good without breaking the bank

customerPersonas.name: The Savvy Explorer
customerPersonas.description: Fragrance enthusiast looking to build a collection without luxury prices

button.primary: background-color: rgb(78, 68, 81); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400; font-family: Nunito; padding: 14px 46px; border-radius: 10px; border: 1px solid rgb(78, 68, 81); display: inline-block; text-align: center; cursor: pointer; line-height: 1.5
button.secondary: background-color: rgb(8, 91, 146); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 14px; font-weight: 300; font-family: Nunito; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; border: 0px none rgb(255, 255, 255); display: inline-block; text-align: center; cursor: pointer; line-height: 1.5

heading.h2: color: rgb(249, 247, 244); font-family: Roboto; font-size: 36px; font-weight: 300; line-height: 36px; text-align: left
heading.h3: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Roboto; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 300; line-height: 24px; text-align: left

paragraph.p: color: rgb(78, 68, 81); font-family: Nunito; font-size: 30px; font-weight: 300; line-height: 39px; text-align: start

emailOptimized.card: background-color: rgb(255, 250, 244); border: 0px none rgb(249, 247, 244); border-radius: 0px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
emailOptimized.testimonial: background-color: rgb(249, 247, 244); border-radius: 0px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(78, 68, 81)
emailOptimized.segment: background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); padding: 0px; margin: 0px; text-align: start

buttons.styles: background-color: var(--color-text-cards); border-color: var(--color-text-cards); color: var(--color-foreground-cards);
font-family: var(--font-stack-body-primary); font-weight: var(--font-weight-body-primary); font-style: var(--font-style-body-primary); line-height: var(--base-body-line);
font-family: var(--font-stack-body-secondary); font-weight: var(--font-weight-body-secondary); font-style: var(--font-stack-body-secondary); line-height: 1.1;

width: 100%; max-width: var(--theme-max-width) !important; padding-left: var(--gutter-container) !important; padding-right: var(--gutter-container) !important; margin-top: clamp(2.5rem,var(--container-vertical-space),4.375rem) !important;

links.selector: html, body, div, span, applet, object, iframe, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, blockquote, pre, a, abbr, acronym, address, big, cite, code, del, dfn, em, img, ins, kbd, q, s, samp, small, strike, strong, sub, sup, tt, var, b, u, i, center, dl, dt, dd, ol, ul, li, fieldset, form, label, legend, table, caption, tbody, tfoot, thead, tr, th, td, article, aside, canvas, details, embed, figure, figcaption, footer, header, hgroup, menu, nav, output, ruby, section, summary, time, mark, audio, video, button
links.styles: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;

links.selector: article, aside, details, figcaption, figure, footer, header, hgroup, menu, nav, section
